name: Plumeria Breakfast Table
description: The Plumeria breakfast table by Kifu Paris is a dramatic and elegant piece. The cream shagreen inlaid top sits on a sculptural bronze-patina brass base that is conceptually inspired by bird feathers floating on top of a lake. The border of the top is accentuated by a subtle and elegant bronze-patina brass indentation detail. This piece is designed by Kifu Augousti, the daughter of Ria and Yiouri Augousti.
